text: Kim Kardashian West and Kris Jenner are so intertwined when it comes to their professional lives that it's sometimes easy to forget that they're mother and daughter. Sure, we all know they're related. But Kris and Kim the brand ( both individually, and as a pair ) is so strong that thinking of them as a mother - daughter duo sometimes comes second. But just like you and your mom, Kris and Kim went through the same mother - daughter things that most of us do. And, yes, that includes the passing down of beauty tips. I talked to Kardashian West about her new cosmetics collection, and she shared the one Kris Jenner - approved beauty tip that's stuck with her all these years. ` ` She [ Kris Jenner ] used to always tell me
